Summary: Get out of movie, heading home saw a bright white light followed by 3 helio, then they began search pattern.
divs: Sighting DetailsComing out of the movies with my wife, and on the way home I saw one very bright light not moving. First I thought it was an airplane but something was not right. Then it move quick to the north which is strange because most planes move south to land at airport. After that saw 3-4 helios. in formation going after it then in a search pattern after 5 mins.
